entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5 except zero near the Alberta border.
